sentences.sentence: The gravel pits have been landscaped and planted to make them attractive to wildfowl.
sentences.translation: 这些乱石坑已经被美化，种了树来吸引野生鸟类。

sentences.sentence: Pits and mounds have significantly different soil properties than other areas in the forest.
sentences.translation: 与森林中的其他地区相比，坑和土丘的土壤性质有显著的不同。

sentences.sentence: I've set up rain barrels and infiltration pits to collect thousands of gallons of storm water cascading from my roof.
sentences.translation: 我设置了雨桶和渗透坑来收集从屋顶倾泻而下的数千加仑雨水。
